00024 void ObjectModelLine::computeRandomModel (int &iterations, Eigen::VectorXd &model_coefficients, bool &isDegenerate,
00025                 bool &modelFound){
00026 
00027 std::vector<int> samples;
00028 std::vector<int> selection;
00029 getSamples(iterations,selection);
00030 
00031 if (selection.size () == 0){
00032         isDegenerate = false;
00033         modelFound = false;
00034         return;
00035 } else {
00036 
00037         isDegenerate = true;
00038 
00039 }
00040 
00041 if (!computeModelCoefficients (selection, model_coefficients)){
00042         modelFound = false;
00043         return;
00044 } else {
00045         modelFound = true;
00046         return;
00047 }
00048 }
00049 
00050 void ObjectModelLine::getSamples (int &iterations, std::vector<int> &samples){
00051 
00052 
00053         samples.resize (2);
00054         double trand = this->inputPointCloud->getSize() / (RAND_MAX + 1.0);
00055 
00056         // Get a random number between 1 and max_indices
00057         int idx = (int)(rand () * trand);
00058         // Get the index
00059         samples[0] = idx;
00060 
00061         // Get a second point which is different than the first
00062         do
00063         {
00064                 idx = (int)(rand () * trand);
00065                 samples[1] = idx;
00066                 iterations++;
00067 
00068                 if (iterations > MAX_ITERATIONS_COLLINEAR)
00069                 {
00070                         cout<<"[ObjectModelLine::getSamples] WARNING: Could not select 2 unique points in "
00071                                         <<MAX_ITERATIONS_COLLINEAR<<" iterations!";
00072                         break;
00073                 }
00074         } while (samples[1] == samples[0]);
00075         iterations--;
00076 }
00077 
00078 bool ObjectModelLine::computeModelCoefficients (const std::vector<int> &samples,
00079                 Eigen::VectorXd &model_coefficients){
00080 
00081         assert (samples.size () == 2);
00082 
00083         model_coefficients.resize (6);
00084         model_coefficients[0] = (*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[samples[0]].getX();
00085         model_coefficients[1] = (*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[samples[0]].getY();
00086         model_coefficients[2] = (*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[samples[0]].getZ();
00087 
00088         model_coefficients[3] = (*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[samples[1]].getX() - model_coefficients[0];
00089         model_coefficients[4] = (*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[samples[1]].getY() - model_coefficients[1];
00090         model_coefficients[5] = (*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[samples[1]].getZ() - model_coefficients[2];
00091 
00092 #ifdef EIGEN3
00093         model_coefficients.tail<3> ().normalize ();
00094 #else
00095         model_coefficients.end<3> ().normalize ();
00096 #endif
00097         return (true);
00098 }
00099 
00100 void ObjectModelLine::optimizeModelCoefficients (const std::vector<int> &inliers,
00101                 const Eigen::VectorXd &model_coefficients,
00102                 Eigen::VectorXd &optimized_coefficients){
00103         assert (model_coefficients.size () == 6);
00104 
00105         if (inliers.size () == 0)
00106         {
00107                 cout<<"[ObjectModelLine::optimizeModelCoefficients] Inliers vector empty! Returning the same coefficients";
00108                 optimized_coefficients = model_coefficients;
00109                 return;
00110         }
00111 
00112         assert (inliers.size () > 2);
00113 
00114         optimized_coefficients.resize (6);
00115 
00116         // Compute the 3x3 covariance matrix
00117         Eigen::Vector4d centroid;
00118         compute3DCentroid (this->inputPointCloud, inliers, centroid);
00119         Eigen::Matrix3d covariance_matrix;
00120         computeCovarianceMatrix (inputPointCloud, inliers, centroid, covariance_matrix);
00121         optimized_coefficients[0] = centroid[0];
00122         optimized_coefficients[1] = centroid[1];
00123         optimized_coefficients[2] = centroid[2];
00124 
00125         // Extract the eigenvalues and eigenvectors
00126         //cloud_geometry::eigen_cov (covariance_matrix, eigen_values, eigen_vectors);
00127         Eigen::SelfAdjointEigenSolver<Eigen::Matrix3d> ei_symm (covariance_matrix);
00128         EIGEN_ALIGN_MEMORY Eigen::Vector3d eigen_values  = ei_symm.eigenvalues ();
00129         EIGEN_ALIGN_MEMORY Eigen::Matrix3d eigen_vectors = ei_symm.eigenvectors ();
00130 
00131 #ifdef EIGEN3
00132         optimized_coefficients.tail<3> () = eigen_vectors.col (2).normalized ();
00133 #else
00134         optimized_coefficients.end<3> () = eigen_vectors.col (2).normalized ();
00135 #endif
00136 
00137 }
00138 
00139 
00140 void ObjectModelLine::getDistancesToModel (const Eigen::VectorXd &model_coefficients,
00141                 std::vector<double> &distances){
00142         assert (model_coefficients.size () == 6);
00143 
00144         distances.resize (this->inputPointCloud->getSize());
00145 
00146         // Obtain the line point and direction
00147         Eigen::Vector4d line_pt  (model_coefficients[0], model_coefficients[1], model_coefficients[2], 0);
00148         Eigen::Vector4d line_dir (model_coefficients[3], model_coefficients[4], model_coefficients[5], 0);
00149         Eigen::Vector4d line_p2 = line_pt + line_dir;
00150 
00151         // Iterate through the 3d points and calculate the distances from them to the line
00152         for (size_t i = 0; i < this->inputPointCloud->getSize(); ++i)
00153         {
00154                 // Calculate the distance from the point to the line
00155                 // D = ||(P2-P1) x (P1-P0)|| / ||P2-P1|| = norm (cross (p2-p1, p2-p0)) / norm(p2-p1)
00156                 Eigen::Vector4d pt ((*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[i].getX(), (*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[i].getY(),
00157                                 (*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[i].getZ(), 0);
00158                 Eigen::Vector4d pp = line_p2 - pt;
00159 
00160 #ifdef EIGEN3
00161                 Eigen::Vector3d c = pp.head<3> ().cross (line_dir.head<3> ());
00162 #else
00163                 Eigen::Vector3d c = pp.start<3> ().cross (line_dir.start<3> ());
00164 #endif
00165                 //distances[i] = sqrt (c.dot (c)) / line_dir.dot (line_dir);
00166                 distances[i] = c.dot (c) / line_dir.dot (line_dir);
00167         }
00168 }
00169 
00170 void ObjectModelLine::selectWithinDistance (const Eigen::VectorXd &model_coefficients, double threshold,
00171                 std::vector<int> &inliers){
00172         assert (model_coefficients.size () == 6);
00173 
00174         double sqr_threshold = threshold * threshold;
00175 
00176         int nr_p = 0;
00177         inliers.resize (this->inputPointCloud->getSize());
00178 
00179         // Obtain the line point and direction
00180         Eigen::Vector4d line_pt  (model_coefficients[0], model_coefficients[1], model_coefficients[2], 0);
00181         Eigen::Vector4d line_dir (model_coefficients[3], model_coefficients[4], model_coefficients[5], 0);
00182         Eigen::Vector4d line_p2 = line_pt + line_dir;
00183 
00184         // Iterate through the 3d points and calculate the distances from them to the line
00185         for (size_t i = 0; i < this->inputPointCloud->getSize(); ++i)
00186         {
00187                 // Calculate the distance from the point to the line
00188                 // D = ||(P2-P1) x (P1-P0)|| / ||P2-P1|| = norm (cross (p2-p1, p2-p0)) / norm(p2-p1)
00189                 Eigen::Vector4d pt ((*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[i].getX(),
00190                                 (*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[i].getY(), (*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[i].getZ(), 0);
00191                 Eigen::Vector4d pp = line_p2 - pt;
00192 
00193 #ifdef EIGEN3
00194                 Eigen::Vector3d c = pp.head<3> ().cross (line_dir.head<3> ());
00195 #else
00196                 Eigen::Vector3d c = pp.start<3> ().cross (line_dir.start<3> ());
00197 #endif
00198                 //distances[i] = sqrt (c.dot (c)) / line_dir.dot (line_dir);
00199                 double sqr_distance = c.dot (c) / line_dir.dot (line_dir);
00200 
00201                 if (sqr_distance < sqr_threshold)
00202                 {
00203                         // Returns the indices of the points whose squared distances are smaller than the threshold
00204                         inliers[nr_p] = i;
00205                         nr_p++;
00206                 }
00207         }
00208         inliers.resize (nr_p);
00209 }

00212 void ObjectModelLine::getInlierDistance (std::vector<int> &inliers, const Eigen::VectorXd &model_coefficients,
00213                 std::vector<double> &distances){
00214 
00215         assert (model_coefficients.size () == 6);
00216 
00217         distances.resize (this->inputPointCloud->getSize());
00218 
00219         // Obtain the line point and direction
00220         Eigen::Vector4d line_pt  (model_coefficients[0], model_coefficients[1], model_coefficients[2], 0);
00221         Eigen::Vector4d line_dir (model_coefficients[3], model_coefficients[4], model_coefficients[5], 0);
00222         Eigen::Vector4d line_p2 = line_pt + line_dir;
00223 
00224         // Iterate through the 3d points and calculate the distances from them to the line
00225         for (size_t i = 0; i < this->inputPointCloud->getSize(); ++i)
00226         {
00227                 // Calculate the distance from the point to the line
00228                 // D = ||(P2-P1) x (P1-P0)|| / ||P2-P1|| = norm (cross (p2-p1, p2-p0)) / norm(p2-p1)
00229                 Eigen::Vector4d pt ((*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[inliers[i]].getX(), (*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[inliers[i]].getY(),
00230                                 (*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[inliers[i]].getZ(), 0);
00231                 Eigen::Vector4d pp = line_p2 - pt;
00232 
00233 #ifdef EIGEN3
00234                 Eigen::Vector3d c = pp.head<3> ().cross (line_dir.head<3> ());
00235 #else
00236                 Eigen::Vector3d c = pp.start<3> ().cross (line_dir.start<3> ());
00237 #endif
00238                 //distances[i] = sqrt (c.dot (c)) / line_dir.dot (line_dir);
00239                 distances[i] = c.dot (c) / line_dir.dot (line_dir);
00240         }
00241 }

00243 
00244 void ObjectModelLine::projectPoints (const std::vector<int> &inliers, const Eigen::VectorXd &model_coefficients,
00245                 PointCloud3D* projectedPointCloud){
00246 
00247 
00248         assert (model_coefficients.size () == 6);
00249 
00250         // Obtain the line point and direction
00251         Eigen::Vector4d line_pt  (model_coefficients[0], model_coefficients[1], model_coefficients[2], 0);
00252         Eigen::Vector4d line_dir (model_coefficients[3], model_coefficients[4], model_coefficients[5], 0);
00253 
00254         // Iterate through the 3d points and calculate the distances from them to the line
00255         for (size_t i = 0; i < inliers.size (); ++i)
00256         {
00257                 Eigen::Vector4d pt ((*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[inliers[i]].getX(), (*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[inliers[i]].getY(),
00258                                 (*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[inliers[i]].getZ(), 0);
00259                 // double k = (DOT_PROD_3D (points[i], p21) - dotA_B) / dotB_B;
00260                 double k = (pt.dot (line_dir) - line_pt.dot (line_dir)) / line_dir.dot (line_dir);
00261 
00262                 Eigen::Vector4d pp = line_pt + k * line_dir;
00263                 // Calculate the projection of the point on the line (pointProj = A + k * B)
00264 //              std::vector<Point3D> *projectedPoints = projectedPointCloud->getPointCloud();
00265                 (*projectedPointCloud->getPointCloud())[i].setX(pp[0]);
00266                 (*projectedPointCloud->getPointCloud())[i].setY(pp[1]);
00267                 (*projectedPointCloud->getPointCloud())[i].setZ(pp[2]);
00268         }
00269 
00270 }

00273 bool ObjectModelLine::doSamplesVerifyModel (const std::set<int> &indices, const Eigen::VectorXd &model_coefficients,
00274                 double threshold){
00275 
00276         assert (model_coefficients.size () == 6);
00277 
00278      // Obtain the line point and direction
00279      Eigen::Vector4d line_pt  (model_coefficients[0], model_coefficients[1], model_coefficients[2], 0);
00280      Eigen::Vector4d line_dir (model_coefficients[3], model_coefficients[4], model_coefficients[5], 0);
00281      Eigen::Vector4d line_p2 = line_pt + line_dir;
00282 
00283      double sqr_threshold = threshold * threshold;
00284      // Iterate through the 3d points and calculate the distances from them to the line
00285      for (std::set<int>::iterator it = indices.begin (); it != indices.end (); ++it)
00286      {
00287        // Calculate the distance from the point to the line
00288        // D = ||(P2-P1) x (P1-P0)|| / ||P2-P1|| = norm (cross (p2-p1, p2-p0)) / norm(p2-p1)
00289        Eigen::Vector4d pt ((*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[*it].getX(), (*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[*it].getY(),
00290                    (*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[*it].getZ(), 0);
00291        Eigen::Vector4d pp = line_p2 - pt;
00292 
00293 #ifdef EIGEN3
00294                 Eigen::Vector3d c = pp.head<3> ().cross (line_dir.head<3> ());
00295 #else
00296                 Eigen::Vector3d c = pp.start<3> ().cross (line_dir.start<3> ());
00297 #endif
00298        double sqr_distance = c.dot (c) / line_dir.dot (line_dir);
00299 
00300        if (sqr_distance > sqr_threshold)
00301          return (false);
00302      }
00303 
00304      return (true);
00305 }
